examples: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=0

# Push Bundles to GitHub ## Table of Contents * [Overview](#overview) * [Installation Prerequisites](#installation-prerequisites) * [Requirements](#requirements) * [Features](#features) * [How to Install](#how-to-install) * [How to Run](#how-to-run) ## Overview The **Push Bundles to GitHub** pre-built takes an Admin Essentials installed pre-built and creates a new project in GitHub using the up-to-date pre-built bundle%2E If the project and branch already exists in the specified GitHub group, it will create a new branch and open a pull request in GitHub with any changes made in the lab environment%2E
## Installation Prerequisites Users must satisfy the following pre-requisites: * Itential Automation Platform * `^2021%2E2` * App-Artifacts * `6%2E1%2E16-2021%2E1%2E2` * [GitHub Adapter](https://gitlab%2Ecom/itentialopensource/adapters/devops-netops/adapter-github) ## Requirements This artifact requires the following: * Artifact installed in Admin Essentials * GitHub Organization Name ## Features The main benefits and features of the artifact are outlined below%2E * Automatically create repo and branch%2E * Automatically create Pull Request when repo and branch exist%2E * Allows user to perform rediscovery of an installed artifact (where new components were added)%2E * Adds the current IAP user whoami username to the Pull Request description for the Pull Request reviewer%2E * Auto artifact%2Ejson generator script * Helps to handle "Artifact-As-Code" with version control, PR, and code-promotion procedures%2E ## How to Install To install this pre-built: * Verify you are running a supported version of the Itential Automation Platform (IAP) as listed above in the [Requirements](#requirements) section%2E * The artifact can be installed from within App-Admin_Essential%2E Simply search for the name of your desired artifact and click the install button (as shown below)%2E
## How to Run Use the following to run the artifact: 1%2E In Automation Catalog, find the **Push Bundles to GitHub** entry%2E 2%2E Fill out the form (as shown below) with the appropriate values%2E 3%2E Continue with all manual tasks in the workflow%2E
Form Inputs (look for above screenshot for example inputs) 1%2E Adapter Name - Adapter name configured with user token 2%2E GitHub Project Name - Project name in GitHub to Update/Create 3%2E GitHub Organization Name - GitHub organization name to push repository 4%2E Re-discover - Perform re-discover 5%2E Artifact - name of the installed bundle to push onto remote repo 6%2E PR Type - Type of PR (patch/minor/major) 7%2E Commit Message - Commit message to add for commit tasks 8%2E Target Branch - Traget branch to set for PR

data.name: createResultObject
data.description: Creates a default report object with the default "FAILURE" set for each command. This is used in case the netmiko command errors so parents can see that the device/cmds failed.

data.name: convertObjecttoStringGithubSingleRepo
data.description: Separates the action, filePath, and content from the inputted object.

readme: # Pre-Built Name ## Table of Contents * [Overview](#overview) * [Installation Prerequisites](#installation-prerequisites) * [Requirements](#requirements) * [Features](#features) * [Future Enhancements](#future-enhancements) * [How to Install](#how-to-install) * [How to Run](#how-to-run) * [Additional Information](#additional-information) ## Overview _Estimated Run Time_: ## Installation Prerequisites Users must satisfy the following pre-requisites: * Itential Automation Platform * `^2021.1` ## Requirements This Pre-Built requires the following: ## Features The main benefits and features of the Pre-Built are outlined below. ## Future Enhancements ## How to Install To install the Pre-Built: * Verify you are running a supported version of the Itential Automation Platform (IAP) as listed above in the [Requirements](#requirements) section in order to install the Pre-Built. * The Pre-Built can be installed from within App-Admin_Essential. Simply search for the name of your desired Pre-Built and click the install button (as shown below). ## How to Run Use the following to run the Pre-Built: ## Additional Information Please use your Itential Customer Success account if you need support when using this Pre-Built.
